title: Ohisama no Hana
sinopse:
A collection of short stories by the mangaka of "The Devil Does Exist" ("Akuma de Sourou") and "Crimson Hero" ("Beniiro Hero")

Story 1: Ohisama no Hana ("The Flowers of the Sun")
Story 2: Bonnou 17 ("Desirous Seventeen")
Story 3: Sweet Home
Story 4: Stardust Flower
Story 5: Nakahara Babies
